subject: Re: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I'm with Stefan on this one, i'll take robotic if i have the 
opportunity to get longer messages from them.  The point is 
advancement right?  Not how cool the voices sound, whether male or 
female.

-Steve



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Stefan Bion <yahoogroups@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Steve & Mike,
> 
> > If we can get the allophone file with real human voices, than this
> > would be the next step i think.  
> 
> This probably wouldn't work; the allophones must all have the same
> pitch to fit together when concatenated.
> 
> > In a box recording you can get an assemblance of male or female, 
and
> > you can even get language accents. ie british, indian, spanish, 
etc...
> > With the allophone/soap, you have one electroinic voice.
>    
> Of course the robotic sound of the SpeechJet allophones is far from
> being natural speech, but it seems to allow longer messages than 
other
> raw audio with more variety of the sounds. So it seems we'll have to
> decide between information content and naturalness/individuality of 
the
> voices.
> 
> Stefan
>
